entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:59 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: W 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
